Comment on attachment 522033
Earthlink.com / nx.netcom / mindspring are POP only

If the IMAP server works, but the ISP *explicitly* asked us not to use that config, then we should make POP the default, by putting it first, but leave the IMAP config in as option. That's what we did for Yahoo.
